page.title: 07Tourism (1), Bowness.
page.content: {Bowness-on-Windermere}is the{Lake {District's}most popular holiday resort.The centre for{boating activities is{Bowness Bay}where you can find the jetties of the boat hire firms and the{Steamer Pier. {Belle Isle}is Windermere's largest island and is open to the public. The house on Belle Isle was the first completely{round}house built in England. A new{"Upstairs,Downstairs" exhibition of life in a large house has just opened for the{1985}season. There are several good{viewpoints}and {walks}in the area giving excellent vistas of the lake, notably{School {Knott,Biskey Howe,Brant Fell}and{Post {Knott.} There is a{Tourist Information Centre on the Promenade together with tennis courts,putting green and mini golf course.
